metadata.name: Suspicious Mstsc.EXE Execution With Local RDP File
metadata.comment: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file located in suspicious locations.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\mstsc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mstsc.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.rdp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.rdp"'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\spool\\\\drivers\\\\color')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\tasks_migrated ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\tasks\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\tracing\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\downloads\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file located in suspicious locations.

metadata.objective: False positive: Likelihood is related to how often the paths are used in the environment References: https://www.blackhillsinfosec.com/rogue-rdp-revisiting-initial-access-methods/, https://web.archive.org/web/20230726144748/https://blog.thickmints.dev/mintsights/detecting-rogue-rdp/
